title: spritualearner

content: Hello I need a loan of 400 usdtI will repay 500 usdt in about 2 weeksHere's my addressTPcdjfqBVHhTASWo7J86uiSUXyk51Vr47u

comments.body: lol i researched for for 2 days to get the loan and i found this, i wasnt expecting to someone to give me loan right away because im newbie but i had to do it because of the need, i invested in one investment platform or site to get me more profit but they turned out to be scam because no withdrawal. im not a scammer im just a needy person and i understand value of your money.

comments.author: condoras
comments.body: Quote from: spritualearner on June 15, 2023, 02:05:00 PMlol i researched for for 2 days to get the loan and i found this, i wasnt expecting to someone to give me loan right away because im newbie but i had to do it because of the need, i invested in one investment platform or site to get me more profit but they turned out to be scam because no withdrawal. im not a scammer im just a needy person and i understand value of your money.So, because you make the wrong decision (suppose you didn't know that this was a scam project), you want a loan? Do you know how idiotic that sounds?You spend 2 days on something that it's easy to see and understand in a minute. No Collateral = No Loan.Since it's clear that you don't have any valid collateral, lock your thread and look elsewhere.
